translation.en: Hey, birthday girl! Happy 21st!
Have fun tonight, ladies. Just remember to make good…
choices.
[Chad] Hey, bottle chick!
Be a sweetheart and grab another round of these bad boys?
Get it yourself. I only serve VIP.
translation.es: Búscalo tú mismo. Solo atiendo a los VIP.

translation.en: Ignore her. You guys are very important.
Oh! Beach ball!
-Hurry up. Hurry up! -I am hurrying.
[Ava] There you go.
-[Maya] Ava, we might have a problem. -What is it?
My sensors are picking up something. Got a countdown and heat signature.
translation.es: Detecté algo con una cuenta regresiva y una señal de calor.

translation.en: Coming from under the pool.
What? How much time?
-Eighty-three seconds and counting. -That doesn't make sense.
translation.es: - Ochenta y tres segundos y contando. - No tiene sentido.

translation.en: I've got eyes on the target. Blowing himself up is not his MO.
translation.es: Veo al objetivo. Volarse a sí mismo no es su estilo.

translation.en: I don't know. I wouldn't be so sure about that.
translation.es: No lo sé. No estoy tan seguro.

translation.en: MOs change. This guy's a wild card.
Yeah, well so are you.
The hell were you doing talking to me earlier?
Playing a Vegas douchebag, like we talked about.
translation.es: Solo hago mi papel de engreído de Las Vegas.

translation.en: -The role you were born to play. -[exclaims]
translation.es: El papel para el que naciste.

translation.en: Sixty seconds.
Ready to engage.
Gomez, look alive.
[Angela] Copy that. Target is in the crosshairs.
translation.es: Recibido. El objetivo está en la mira.

translation.en: I can outfit his head with a new hole on your command. Just say the word.
translation.es: Solo dame la orden, y adornaré su cabeza con un hueco.

translation.en: McKnight, you do not say the word. Koslov is no martyr.
translation.es: McKnight, no des la orden. Koslov no es un mártir.

translation.en: Killing him does nothing to stop the threat.
Under a minute means there's no time to find and deactivate the nuke.
translation.es: No podemos encontrar y desactivar la bomba a tiempo.

translation.en: For all we know, his phone is the detonator.
translation.es: Su teléfono podría ser el detonador.

translation.en: I have a clean shot.
I can take out his muscle. No collateral damage.
translation.es: Derribaré a su guardia. Sin daños colaterales.

translation.en: Except flushing months of work down the drain.
translation.es: A excepción de los meses de trabajo perdidos.

translation.en: Do not take that shot.
-That's an order. -I give my team orders.
translation.es: - Es una orden. - Yo soy el líder.

translation.en: And I give you orders. How the fuck do you not get that by now?
translation.es: Y yo soy tu superior. ¿Cómo es que aún no lo entiendes?

translation.en: -Twenty seconds. -[Chad] Come on, Winters.
We're supposed to stop the bad guy, not sit here while he blows up Vegas.
translation.es: Debemos detener al malo, no esperar a que explote Las Vegas.

translation.en: He's not blowing up Vegas. At least not until he's miles away.
translation.es: No explotará nada hasta estar a kilómetros de distancia.

translation.en: -How can you be sure? -It's my job to be sure.
-Ten seconds. -Am I going hot or not?
Do not take that shot. He's a businessman. Not a suicide bomber.
translation.es: No dispares. Es un empresario, no un kamikaze.

translation.en: Five, four, three…
-Wait! -[firecrackers exploding]
[Maya] The signal's tied to the DJ booth.
They must have rigged pyro for the show.
You don't say.
Told you.
Sorry, team. Tech's a little oversensitive.
translation.es: Lo siento. Los equipos son demasiado sensibles.

translation.en: Don't sweat it, Tech Chick. We all make mistakes.
translation.es: No te preocupes, Cerebrito. Todos nos equivocamos.

translation.en: God didn't when he made those abs.
This team can't afford to make mistakes. Tighten up.
translation.es: Este equipo no puede permitirse cometer errores. Despabílate.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am. Roger that. Sorry.
I'm going in.
You got out of the water. Warm and cozy.
translation.es: Saliste del agua. Cálido y acogedor.

translation.en: There she is. The jewel of Las Vegas.
translation.es: Ahí está la joya de Las Vegas.

translation.en: [in Russian] My edges are too soft to be a jewel.
translation.es: Mis bordes son muy suaves como para ser una joya.

translation.en: [chuckles] Your Russian is flawless. Where are you from?
translation.es: Tu ruso es impecable. ¿De dónde eres?

translation.en: Kalamazoo, Michigan. [chuckles]
[in Russian] My aunt's from the Zamoskvorechye district, in Moscow.
translation.es: Mi tía es del distrito de Zamoskvorechye, en Moscú.

translation.en: That explains how your beauty stands out here.
translation.es: Eso explica por qué tu belleza se destaca.

translation.en: If you wanna get away, I'm leaving on my jet tonight.
translation.es: Hoy partiré en mi jet privado si quieres venir.

translation.en: [in English] Where'd we be going?
Well, that would take the mystery away.
Let's just say you'll be better off with me than staying here.
translation.es: Digamos que estarás mejor conmigo que quedándote aquí.

translation.en: Why do you say that?
Something tells me that tonight the city's going to be dead.
translation.es: Algo me dice que la ciudad estará muerta esta noche.

translation.en: Here, give me your number. I'll call you when I'm ready to leave.
translation.es: Toma, dame tu número. Te llamaré cuando esté por partir.

translation.en: Don't tell. I could get fired.
translation.es: No digas nada o podrían despedirme.

translation.en: Your secret is safe with me.
[in Russian] Hey, boss…
Our guests have arrived and are ready to eat.
translation.es: Nuestros invitados están listos para comer.

translation.en: They are waiting for you. [in Russian] Let them wait, it's only appetizers.
translation.es: - Lo están esperando. - Que esperen. Solo son los aperitivos.

translation.en: I'll be on time for the main course.
You guys are no fun.
[in English] I must go. I'll see you tonight. Definitely.
translation.es: - Debo irme. Te veré esta noche. - Sin duda.

translation.en: Georgie!
This is it. Koslov's meeting the buyers.
translation.es: Koslov se reunirá con los compradores.

translation.en: Gomez, rendezvous out front. Full tactical pursuit.
translation.es: Gomez, ve al frente. Iremos a buscarlo.

translation.en: No. He feels our surveillance we'll lose him.
translation.es: No. Si sospecha que lo vigilamos, lo perderemos.

translation.en: Ivan may be wild, but he's not reckless.
translation.es: Ivan es alocado, pero no imprudente.

translation.en: -So, we sit here and do nothing? -I didn't say we do nothing.
translation.es: - Entonces, ¿no haremos nada? - No dije eso.

translation.en: Get the vulture.
Hi!
[in English] Whole gang is here, huh?
Apologies for my delay.
Wanted to do the last dance with Las Vegas before the party is over.
translation.es: Quería un último baile con Las Vegas antes de que termine la fiesta.

translation.en: Huh? A thing of beauty, isn't it?
-Five kilotons of destructive power. -[device clicking]
Enough to level the city,
and also compact enough to fit in the trunk of your car.
translation.es: y cabe en el baúl del auto.

translation.en: Mobile, undetectable.
All you have to do is set the timer and fly away.
translation.es: Solo deben configurar el cronómetro y huir.

translation.en: And in a few hours, the city goes…
translation.es: Y, en unas horas, la ciudad hará…

translation.en: In a mushroom cloud.
It's the real deal.
-[man] The security's in your account. -Wonderful. Let's celebrate!
And remember our arrangement.
Do not press the button until our plane is 20,000 feet up in the air.
translation.es: No aprieten el botón hasta que mi avión esté a 6000 metros de altura.

translation.en: We'll wait till your flight attendant has served drinks.
translation.es: Esperaremos a que la sobrecargo les sirva las bebidas.

translation.en: No, she prefers "stewardess." Pleasure doing business with you.
translation.es: No, prefiere "azafata". Fue un placer hacer negocios.

translation.en: This is the United States Military. Everyone put your hands on your heads.
translation.es: Fuerzas Armadas de Estados Unidos. Pongan las manos en la cabeza.

translation.en: [in Russian] Bitch!
Guess we're doing it the hard way.
translation.es: Supongo que será por las malas.

translation.en: Vulture's going hot.
Canister deployed. It's all yours, McKnight.
Limit your fire. Winters wants these fuckers alive.
translation.es: Sean cautelosos. Winters los quiere vivos.

translation.en: [in Russian] Kill them all, bitch!
Change of plans! Take 'em all down!
Get down.
-Heads or tails? -Heads.
-Nice work. -Yeah.
Oh, fuck.
Motherfucker.
Take him.
-I'm out. Toss me a mag. -What? No thank you?
[Trunk over comms] East wing clear. Check the back room.
[Chad] Winters.
[Ava] It's Koslov. He has the nuke.
Fuck.
Gomez. Little help?
-No shot. Hang tight a minute. -We don't have a minute.
translation.es: - Esperen un minuto. - No tenemos un minuto.

translation.en: It's a figure of speech.
Three, two, one, bedtime.
[Angela] All clear.
You got that right.
[Ava] He's in one of these rooms.
[Chad] Clear!
[Chad] What the fuck?
-Please don't kill me. -We're the US Government.
translation.es: - No me maten. - Somos del Gobierno.

translation.en: -You're okay. -Looks like someone had a party.
translation.es: - Estás bien. - Parece que se divertían.

translation.en: None of that's mine. I've just been hooking up with this guy.
translation.es: No es mío. Solo salía con este tipo.

translation.en: I don't know if he's a drug dealer. I don't do that shit. Like, usually.
translation.es: No sé si es un traficante de drogas. No consumo… regularmente.

translation.en: Relax. We're gonna get you someplace safe. You just sit tight.
translation.es: Tranquila. Te llevaremos a un lugar seguro. Espera.

translation.en: Wait. You're leaving me here?
[Chad] He must be in here.
We have him cornered.
-He could have an army in there. -Bring 'em on.
translation.es: - Podría tener más seguridad adentro. - Adelante.

translation.en: Wait.
This is a vault room.
The door's made of reinforced steel. You'll break your leg.
translation.es: La puerta está reforzada con acero. Te lastimarás.

translation.en: Lerner. We have a secure door. Electronic lock. Can you open it remotely?
translation.es: Lerner. ¿Puedes abrir remotamente una puerta con cerradura electrónica?

translation.en: You bet. Hang on.
Just finding the right frequency.
-Find it faster. -Yes, ma'am. That should do it.
translation.es: - Busca más rápido. - Sí, señora. Ya está.

translation.en: -[door unlocks] -You're the tits, Tech Chick.
I'm the tits.
Back away from the bomb. It's over.
translation.es: Aléjate de la bomba. Se acabó.

translation.en: Mmm. My little Jewel of Las Vegas. Well, this is where you are wrong.
translation.es: Mi joya de Las Vegas. Estás equivocada.

translation.en: I've activated the weapon.
You didn't come this far to go down with the ship.
translation.es: No te hundirás con el barco.

translation.en: No, I didn't.
But if there is no ship, what's the point of treading water?
translation.es: Pero, si no hay barco, ¿qué sentido tiene lanzarnos al agua?

translation.en: He's not bluffing. Your bomb tech as good as they say he is?
translation.es: Habla en serio. ¿Tu experto en bombas es tan bueno como dice?

translation.en: Best in the business.
He better be.
[Chad] Two more!
Get me Hagerty.
All right.
Let's see this bitch.
[Hagerty] Looks like we got a little time.
[exhales deeply] This puppy's hot.
-Detectable C-4. PETN fuse. -[liquid bubbling]
translation.es: Un C-4 eléctrico. Imbuido en EET.

translation.en: This thing's a beaut.
Anybody else getting a half chub?
-What's he doing? -He's looking for a perfect song.
All bomb guys are weirdos, but trust me, he's an artist.
translation.es: Todos los técnicos son raros, pero él es un artista.

translation.en: Just let him do his thing.
Will you find a song already?
Just relax, sweetheart.
Okay, the whole key to this is just to forget that there's a clock at all.
translation.es: La clave de todo esto es olvidar que hay un reloj.

translation.en: So? There's no clock.
There is no--
["Feeling Good" by Michael Bublé playing] ♪ Birds flying high ♪
♪ You know how I feel ♪
♪ Sun in the sky ♪
♪ You know how I feel ♪
♪ Breeze driftin' on by ♪
♪ You know how I feel ♪
♪ It's a new dawn ♪
♪ It's a new day ♪
♪ It's a new life ♪
-♪ For me ♪ -♪ For me ♪
-♪ And I'm feeling good ♪ -♪ And I'm feeling good ♪
translation.es: - Y me siento bien. - Y me siento bien.

translation.en: -♪ I'm feeling good ♪ -♪ I'm feeling good ♪
translation.es: - Y me siento bien. - Y me siento bien.

translation.en: Who has one thumb and just saved Las Vegas?
translation.es: ¿Quién tiene un pulgar y salvó a Las Vegas?

translation.en: This guy!
That motherfucker!
-Yeah! -Yes!
Yes!
-Fuck yeah! Yeah! -[yells excitedly]
[chanting] USA! USA! USA!
-Yeah! -Yeah!
[Hagerty] Yes, baby!
-Great work. -[Maya] Thank you.
[Chad] Look at this motherfucker. Goddamn.
translation.es: Miren a este hijo de puta. Maldición.

translation.en: Oh, man. Koslov's in custody. Bomb deactivated. Crisis averted.
translation.es: Koslov bajo custodia. Bomba desactivada. Crisis evitada.

translation.en: This town should throw us a goddamn ticker-tape parade.
translation.es: Esta ciudad debería hacernos una gran fiesta.

translation.en: That was quick.
Ladies, you wanna meet a real American…
translation.es: Señoritas, si quieren a un verdadero héroe…

translation.en: hero?
What the hell?
A DJ? You gotta be kidding me.
We just saved the world and this candy ass gets all the love?
translation.es: ¿Salvamos al mundo, y ese cobarde recibe toda la atención?

translation.en: -[Trunk] Candy ass. -That's the world we live in, yo.
translation.es: - Cobarde. - Es el mundo en el que vivimos.

translation.en: Had we streamed our take down on TikTok, we'd be trending.
translation.es: Si lo hubiéramos transmitido en vivo, seríamos tendencia.

translation.en: No one's ever gonna know what we did.
translation.es: Nadie nunca sabrá lo que hicimos.

translation.en: Because until all this is declassified, today never happened.
translation.es: Porque hasta que esto sea desclasificado, lo de hoy no pasó.

translation.en: So, what now?
Mission's over. We go back to the hotel, pack up.
translation.es: Se terminó la misión. Vuelvan al hotel a empacar.

translation.en: I ship off to Langley, you to Fort Meade, everyone else to their respective bases.
translation.es: Partiré a Langley y tú, a Fort Meade. Cada uno a su respectiva base.

translation.en: We disband and await word of our next assignments.
translation.es: Nos dividimos y esperamos la próxima misión.

translation.en: No. Whoa! Wait, wait, wait.
Fuck that.
We spent months hunting this son of a bitch.
translation.es: Pasamos meses buscando a este tipo.

translation.en: We finally nabbed the nuke, we fuck up his whole program,
translation.es: Finalmente lo atrapamos, desbaratamos su plan

translation.en: and we're supposed to just quietly go our own separate ways?
translation.es: ¿y se supone que nos vayamos de aquí tranquilamente?

translation.en: We're in Las Vegas, the party capital of the world.
translation.es: Estamos en Las Vegas, la capital mundial de las fiestas.

translation.en: And if the world knew what we did here today,
translation.es: Y si el mundo supiera lo que hicimos aquí hoy,

translation.en: they'd want us to party like the rock stars we are.
translation.es: querría que celebremos como las estrellas que somos.

translation.en: Fuck! They'd demand it.
-Fuckin' A, they would. -Fuck yeah.
2200 hours.
Details TBD, but hear me when I say this.
translation.es: Luego vemos los detalles, pero les prometo

translation.en: I am going to empty every cent that's left in our operational war chest.
translation.es: que gastaré hasta lo último que queda de nuestro fondo de operaciones.

translation.en: Because tonight…
we're gonna show this town how to celebrate real American heroes.
translation.es: le enseñaremos a esta ciudad cómo celebra un verdadero héroe estadounidense.

translation.en: -Fuck yeah! Yeah! -Hell yeah!
-Let's do it! -[Angela] Yeah!
Everyone's invited.
-Ready to get fucked up? -Ready to get fucked…
up.
What do you say, Winters? Send your regrets now or ghost us later?
I'll get back to you.
Copy. We won't hold our breath.
[man] Ava Winters.
-Will you be my wife? -[Ava] I can't believe this is happening.
translation.es: - ¿Te casarías conmigo? - No puedo creer que esté pasando.

translation.en: Good evening, sir.
Good is an understatement.
I'd call it a pretty damn fantastic evening.
translation.es: Diría que es una noche fantástica.

translation.en: When you work in our field, the stakes are always high, but today…
translation.es: Siempre es arriesgado cuando trabaja en nuestro campo,

translation.en: that was historic.
Would have preferred things neater. The buyer wasn't on our radar.
translation.es: Me habría gustado ser más prolija. No previmos al comprador.

translation.en: He's this Swedish blockchain entrepreneur, who thought he could skyrocket his crypto
translation.es: Es un emprendedor de criptomonedas sueco que pensó que podría subir sus acciones

translation.en: by destroying a massive amount of American currency.
translation.es: si destruía una cantidad importante de dólares.

translation.en: Guy sees one Bond film and thinks he can be the next Max Zorin.
translation.es: Quería ser el villano de una película de James Bond.

translation.en: I'll be on a flight in the morning. I want to discuss something.
translation.es: Viajaré temprano mañana para hacerle un reporte.

translation.en: -Winters, no. -You haven't even heard the brief, sir.
translation.es: - Winters, no. - No escuchó el reporte, señor.

translation.en: This mission went longer than you or I could have predicted.
translation.es: Esta misión fue más larga de lo previsto.

translation.en: You never had a chance to grieve.
-I'm fine, sir. -You're taking some time.
translation.es: - Estoy bien, señor. - Se tomará un tiempo.

translation.en: The world will still have plenty of trash to take out when you return.
translation.es: Aún habrá muchos villanos por atrapar cuando regrese.

translation.en: He would've been proud of you.
I know.
Did you get the President's gift?
Yes. Thank you. It's very generous, sir.
translation.es: Sí. Gracias. Es muy generoso, señor.

translation.en: Pop it open. You're officially on vacation. Enjoy it.
translation.es: Ábralo. Está oficialmente de vacaciones. Disfrútelas.

translation.en: ♪ I look hot in it, hot in it I look hot in it… ♪
[Chad] Yes, Trunky!
translation.es: ESTO PASA EN LAS VEGAS ¡Sí, Trunky!

translation.en: You got my end of mission gift! Fits good!
translation.es: ¡Recibiste mi regalo por finalizar la misión! ¡Te queda bien!

translation.en: Like a glove! Thanks, chief.
Almost forgot. I got something for you, too. I hope it fits.
translation.es: También te compré algo. Espero que te quede bien.

translation.en: Gracias, this is…
What is this?
Mmm. You crack it like a chem light. Glows in the dark, can't miss any action.
translation.es: Es como una barra luminosa. Brilla en la oscuridad, así verás todo.

translation.en: -Beat you to death with it. -Watch the face.
translation.es: - Te mataré a golpes con él. - En la cara no.

translation.en: That is not what it's used for. I seen some films showing its proper use.
translation.es: Así no se usa. Vi películas educativas que te enseñan a usarlo.

translation.en: I'll send you the link. But now for your real gifts.
translation.es: Te enviaré el enlace. Pero ahora, sus verdaderos regalos.

translation.en: Fucking drugs. Purest MDMA in the city.
translation.es: Putas drogas. El éxtasis más puro de la ciudad.

translation.en: Knight, I already got gummies in me. Shouldn't add Molly to the mix.
translation.es: Knight, ya ingerí cannabis en gomitas. No debería sumarle pastillas.

translation.en: Molly's a good girl. She doesn't wanna fuck with gummies.
translation.es: Las pastillas son chicas buenas. No pelearán con las gomitas.

translation.en: She just makes 'em dance like no one's watching.
Fuck it, I'm in.
-[Angela] You are. -Yes.
-[waiter] Here ya go. -Here we go.
-Gracias. Great. -Uno mas.
To bad guys and bad bitches.
translation.es: Por los chicos y chicas malas.

translation.en: Beware when the three of us are on the prowl, you're going down.
translation.es: Cuídense cuando los tres estamos al acecho, porque van a caer.

translation.en: Yo, someone's going down. That's for sure.
translation.es: Alguien va a caer. Eso es seguro.

translation.en: Yo, Mac, there's something I've been meaning to talk to you about.
translation.es: Mac, hay algo de lo que quería hablarte.

translation.en: Kind of personal.
Alpha Sierra Sierra, twelve o'clock, pillow princess in the crosshairs.
translation.es: Atención. Chicas lindas en frente. Una fácil en la mira.

translation.en: Oh! Bachelorette party. Nice.
[Angela] Tiara's mine.
[Trunk] The bride? Groom won't appreciate that too much.
translation.es: ¿La novia? Al novio no le agradará eso.

translation.en: [Angela] It's like in the field. Target's in your sights,
translation.es: Es como en el campo. Olvida la vida privada

translation.en: forget their personal lives, or lose your nerve.
translation.es: de tu objetivo o perderás el valor.

translation.en: Goddamn you're cold-blooded.
She's all yours.
All right, so there's two, four, six, seven.
translation.es: Bien. Hay dos, cuatro, seis, siete.

translation.en: -Yeah. Trunk and I'll divvy up the rest. -Agreed. Engage targets, y'all.
translation.es: - Trunk y yo nos dividiremos las demás. - De acuerdo. Ataquen a sus blancos.

translation.en: Let's do it. Hey, you in? We'll talk about that thing later?
Yeah. Let's have some fun. Let's do it.
[Paul] Honey, death lurks around every street corner.
translation.es: Cariño, la muerte está a la vuelta de la esquina.

translation.en: No, I'm not being overdramatic.
Prom night is the most dangerous night for teenage drinking and driving.
translation.es: Los adolescentes beben y manejan más en la noche de graduación. Es peligroso.

translation.en: Make sure Jen has a limo, a driver without a record,
translation.es: Asegúrate de que Jen tenga un chofer registrado

translation.en: and to be home before midnight.
translation.es: y que regrese antes de las 12.

translation.en: Honey. That's not fair. You know I wanted to be there.
translation.es: Cariño. No es justo. Sabes que quería estar ahí.

translation.en: This mission was important.
What? No, of course, I'm not saying our daughter's not important. What the…
translation.es: ¿Qué? No, no dije que nuestra hija no sea importante. ¿Qué…?

translation.en: Hey, Paul's wife, Chad McKnight here.
translation.es: Hola, esposa de Paul, soy Chad McKnight.

translation.en: I just want to say your husband was a real hero today.
translation.es: Quería informarle que su esposo fue un héroe el día de hoy.

translation.en: He did some crazy shit.
Why don't we cut the guy some slack, let him have some fun, huh?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no lo deja en paz y que se divierta un poco?

translation.en: Maybe a couple of lap dances. Handy at most.
translation.es: Quizás un baile erótico. Una paja como mucho.

translation.en: Hello?
She hung up. Fuck, dude.
-Thanks a lot. -She'll forgive you.
-Stop stressing, have a drink. -I don't drink.
translation.es: - Deja de preocuparte y bebe algo. - No bebo.

translation.en: -Maybe that's your problem. -Right.
translation.es: - Puede que ese sea tu problema. - Sí.

translation.en: Gotta loosen the fuck up.
Great! Now I'm drenched.
Me too.
Sorry.
Heard you liked to live large, Koslov.
translation.es: Sé que te gustan los lujos, Koslov.

translation.en: -I made sure to give you our best suite. -Charming.
translation.es: - Te daremos la mejor habitación. - Encantador.

translation.en: Do you happen to know the time?
Time no longer exists for you. You'll never see the light of day again.
translation.es: Para ti, el tiempo ya no existe. No volverás a ver la luz del día.

translation.en: I wouldn't be so sure about that.
translation.es: No estaría tan seguro de eso.

translation.en: I must be starting to trip balls because I see Winters.
translation.es: Debo estar alucinando, porque veo a Winters.

translation.en: [Trunk] Nope, I see her too.
Well, well, well.
Looks like the lone wolf's come to join the pack. Bud Heavy?
translation.es: La loba solitaria se unió a la manada. ¿Cerveza?

translation.en: How the hell did you pull this together on a few hours' notice?
translation.es: ¿Cómo organizaste todo esto en solo unas horas?

translation.en: My inexhaustible resourcefulness.
That and Uncle Sam's dime buys you a lot of Vegas goodwill.
translation.es: Eso y un montón de cosas que compré con el dinero del Gobierno.

translation.en: -[animal grunts] -Have you met Joey?
-Oh, my God. -I rented him from the Tiger King.
translation.es: - Dios mío. - Se lo alquilé al Rey Tigre.

translation.en: Not the one in jail. I'm not an asshole. The new one.
translation.es: No el que está preso. No soy un cretino. El nuevo.

translation.en: He said not to spook him though, these things run like the wind. Don't ya?
translation.es: Dijo que no lo asustemos porque corren muy rápido. ¿No es así?

translation.en: -You're a fucking idiot. -[Chad] My teachers used to say that.
translation.es: - Eres un idiota. - Eso decían mis maestros.

translation.en: -Is Hagerty doing cocaine? -Fuck, no. It's Adderall and ketamine.
translation.es: - ¿Hagerty está aspirando cocaína? - No, son anfetaminas y ketamina.

translation.en: With a horse tranq garnish and a whipp-ed chaser.
translation.es: Con un tranquilizante de caballos y crema batida.

translation.en: Don't you guys get tested?
You know how easy it is to get clean piss? This is America.
translation.es: Es muy fácil conseguir orina limpia. Es EE. UU.

translation.en: In that case, keep clean pissing your career away.
Come on, Winters. You didn't come here to be the fun police.
translation.es: Vamos, Winters. No viniste aquí para controlarnos.

translation.en: Hey, take a cue from Tech Chick. Tech Chick came here to party, right?
translation.es: Sigue el ejemplo de Cerebrito. Ella vino para divertirse, ¿no?

translation.en: Yeah. Party time.
Her name isn't Tech Chick.
Her name is Maya Lerner. She's been on our team for six months.
translation.es: Se llama Maya Lerner. Hace seis meses que trabajamos con ella.

translation.en: Oh, I'm fine with Tech Chick. Or anything you want to call me.
translation.es: Puedes llamarme "Cerebrito". O como quieras llamarme.

translation.en: See? Tech Chick gets it! Love you!
Fuck him. G.I. Jerk-Off wouldn't know his ass from a hole in the ground
translation.es: Que se pudra. El Teniente Idiota no habría podido hacer nada

translation.en: on this mission if it weren't for us.
-Lerner, I need your help with something. -Yes, ma'am.
translation.es: - Lerner, necesito tu ayuda. - Sí, señora.

translation.en: I brought my laptop. "Don't leave home without it."
translation.es: Traje mi computadora. "No salgas sin ella".

translation.en: Forget work. I need you to help me polish this off.
translation.es: Olvídate del trabajo. Ayúdame a beber esto.

translation.en: You want to drink? With me?
-Come on. It's our turn to party. -Okay.
translation.es: - Vamos. Nos toca divertirnos. - De acuerdo.

translation.en: Fuck it!
You want to melt those pretty minds of yours?
otherwise known as flying saucer mushrooms.
Infused with military-grade lysergic acid diethylamide.
translation.es: Enriquecido con dietilamida de ácido lisérgico de grado militar.

translation.en: Yeah, you won't be needing this tonight.
What the hell. It's a party, right? A little pineapple, mixed with guacamole.
translation.es: Qué demonios. Es una fiesta, ¿no? Un poco de piña y guacamole.

translation.en: -Are you feeling it? -Oh, I'm feeling it. You feeling it?
Oh, I'm definitely feeling it.
Measuring U-235 isotope.
That's odd.
This can't be right. We need to take this to the top. Where's Hagerty?
translation.es: ISÓTOPO U-235 A NIVELES SEGUROS Esto no está bien. Hay que consultarlo. ¿Dónde está Hagerty?

translation.en: That is dope.
Yunga! What's going on, kid?
Ladies, I want you to meet my bestie in the whole wide world.
translation.es: Damas, les presento a mi mejor amigo en todo el mundo.

translation.en: This is Captain Paul Yung, USAF,
translation.es: El capitán Paul Yung de las FAEU,

translation.en: which stands for "U Silly As Fuck."
Get off your phone and come join the party.
translation.es: Suelta el teléfono y únete a la fiesta.

translation.en: Hey. There's going to be some water sports here.
translation.es: Oye. Va a haber juegos acuáticos.

translation.en: You want to get in on this?
You know I'm married.
And that's why I'm asking you, Paul. You need this so goddamn bad.
translation.es: Por eso te lo pregunto, Paul. Necesitas esto de verdad.

translation.en: But suit yourself. Okay?
Now go try that guacamole over there. It's the goddamn bomb.
translation.es: Ahora ve a probar el guacamole. Es lo mejor del mundo.

translation.en: You're a fucking genius.
You're the youngest recruit the NSA's ever had.
translation.es: Eres la recluta más joven que ha tenido la NSA.

translation.en: Yeah. And I spend most of my time in a dark van decrypting code.
translation.es: Sí. Y paso mi tiempo en una camioneta descifrando códigos.

translation.en: And then I go out in the real world and I'm clueless.
translation.es: Luego salgo al mundo real y estoy perdida.

translation.en: -We're all fucking clueless. -[giggles]
But then, I look at you and I see the ultimate badass.
translation.es: Pero te miro y veo a la mujer más ruda que existe.

translation.en: -Stop! -You're smart. You're sexy.
You don't shit from anyone. You're a fucking boss.
translation.es: No toleras estupideces. Eres la mejor.

translation.en: How did you find that confidence?
At some point, I guess I realized…
translation.es: En algún momento me di cuenta…

translation.en: if you want things to be a certain way, you can't depend on fate or luck.
translation.es: de que si quiero las cosas de una manera, no puedo depender del destino o la suerte.

translation.en: Just gotta step up. Make it happen yourself.
translation.es: Hay que hacerse cargo y hacerlo una misma.

translation.en: [Chad] Let's do this.
-Grease him up! -Ah! All biceps, no brains.
I've got enough brains.
Oh! Part the sea!
Come on, we're fun.
-[Chad] Back it up! -[growls]
Oh! That is good.
-[Chad] Ready, big boy? -Yeah!
Get a couple drinks in him, sooner or later, someone greases up Trunk.
translation.es: Si Trunk bebe, tarde o temprano, acabará aceitado.

translation.en: No one's taken him down inside of a minute.
translation.es: Nadie lo ha derribado en menos de un minuto.

translation.en: McKnight might be the cockiest son of a bitch I've ever met,
translation.es: McKnight puede ser el tipo más engreído que conozco,

translation.en: that's why the ladies love him.
translation.es: pero a las chicas les encanta.

translation.en: -What kinda ladies is McKnight into? -He'll fuck anything with a pulse.
translation.es: - ¿Cuál es su tipo de mujer? - Cualquier cosa con pulso.

translation.en: If we're talking end game, Ali Larter from Varsity Blues.
translation.es: Pero sería Ali Larter de Juego de campeones.

translation.en: That's his dream girl.
[Chad] All right, bring it up.
USA!
[crowd chanting] USA! USA! USA!
Hey. You do realize you're both USA, right?
Winters, that was a feat of Vin Diesel-ian proportions.
translation.es: Winters, esa fue una hazaña increíble.

translation.en: Okay? Do not act like you're unimpressed.
translation.es: No actúes como si no estuvieras impresionada.

translation.en: You embarrassed yourself for a full minute, then got lucky.
translation.es: Fue un minuto vergonzoso, y luego tuviste suerte.

translation.en: -You can do it faster? -That's not what I said.
translation.es: - ¿Puedes hacerlo más rápido? - No dije eso.

translation.en: But obviously, I can.
-He's all yours. -Oh, thank you.
-[man] Let's see it. -Hey.
-Can I borrow this? -Of course.
-You're so pretty. -Stop.
You sure you want to do this? It'll get that nice dress all dirty.
translation.es: ¿Segura que quieres hacerlo? Ensuciarás ese lindo vestido.

translation.en: Let me worry about the dry cleaning bill. You focus on staying upright.
translation.es: Yo pagaré la tintorería, tú solo concéntrate en no caer.

translation.en: Talk that shit, boss.
Yo, watch yourself, Trunk. That's intelligence coming at you now.
translation.es: Cuidado, Trunk. Te enfrentarás a una inteligente.

translation.en: What?
Holy shit, that's gotta be a new record!
USA?
[crowd chanting] USA! USA! USA! ♪ I'm good, yeah, I'm feelin' all right ♪ ♪ Baby, I'ma have The best fuckin' night of my life ♪
[on answering machine] Hey, it's Jen. Don't leave a message.
translation.es: Hola, soy Jen. No dejes un mensaje.

translation.en: -[beeps] -Jen, I hope you get this message.
translation.es: Jen, espero que recibas este mensaje.

translation.en: My calls are going to voicemail after only a couple rings.
translation.es: Parece que mis llamadas van a buzón más rápido de lo normal.

translation.en: I just want to say, I want you to have fun at prom.
Don't let your friends pressure you
into doing anything I wouldn't do. Okay, sweetheart? [grunts]
translation.es: a hacer algo que yo no haría. ¿Sí, cariño?

translation.en: Ali Larter, Varsity Blues.
Oh, shit.
Need some help getting that grease off, big boy?
Back off. He's mine.
-Oh, what the-- -Oh, shit!
-Oh, fuck! -Oh, fuck!
-Shit. I'm sorry. -Get the fuck out!
-I didn't see anything. -Get the fuck out!
Shit.
You wanted to talk about this?
-Get the fuck out! -Fine! I'm out. I'm out! I'm out!
Holy shit.
Hey. Thank God. No, it's perfect timing. Believe me.
translation.es: Hola. Gracias a Dios. No, justo a tiempo. Créeme.

translation.en: Let me just find some place quiet.
This doesn't add up.
translation.es: AGENCIA DE INTELIGENCIA Esto no tiene sentido.

translation.en: We know that Koslov had enough uranium to blow the city.
translation.es: Koslov tenía suficiente uranio para volar la ciudad.

translation.en: Now the lab is saying the bomb we seized only has hints of it?
translation.es: Pero, según el laboratorio, la bomba tiene cantidades mínimas.

translation.en: -Where's the rest? -Sir!
We just got a message.
It's not good.
Gather the joint chiefs. Situation room, five minutes.
translation.es: Reúna a los jefes de Estado en cinco minutos.

translation.en: Get in touch with Winters.
We need her now more than ever.
[Ava] Fuck waking up tomorrow!
Like they say en français…
-[all cheering] -[in English] Let's get fucked up tonight!
It's all good. S'all good. S'all good. Because you know what?
I'm gonna call room service and have 'em bring us up some more.
translation.es: Llamaré a servicio al cuarto y que nos traigan más.

translation.en: Don't go anywhere. We gotta exchange numbers. Be right back.
translation.es: No se vayan. Quiero sus números de teléfono. Ya regreso.

translation.en: Great to hear your voice, too.
I miss you too.
I'm sorry I left you alone again. I know that's never easy.
translation.es: Lamento haberte dejado sola. Sé que nunca es fácil.

translation.en: [chuckling] I love you too. I can't wait to see you, Mom.
translation.es: Yo también te amo. No puedo esperar a verte, mamá.

translation.en: Oh, shit.
You should have seen it.
We killed more Russians than the Wolverines did in Red Dawn.
translation.es: Matamos a más rusos que los de Los jóvenes defensores.

translation.en: Obviously, the original.
I told you about Gomez's top-secret rifle, that can blow a guy's head off from five…
translation.es: Recuerdas que Gomez tiene un rifle secreto que puede disparar a una distancia…

translation.en: You know what, Mom? Let's catch up tomorrow. Me too. Bye.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué, mamá? Hablamos mañana. Yo también. Adiós.

translation.en: Don't worry. She won't say anything.
translation.es: No te preocupes. No dirá nada.

translation.en: Relax. I'm not gonna rat.
Never figured you for a mama's boy.
translation.es: No pensé que serías un niño de mami.

translation.en: When your dad takes off when you're six, it's kind of what happens.
translation.es: Es lo que sucede si tu papá se marcha cuando tienes seis años.

translation.en: -Not a bad view. -For 60K a night? Fucking better be.
translation.es: - Qué gran vista. - ¿Por 60 000 la noche? Más les vale.

translation.en: -You realize it's taxpayer money. -Schematics.
translation.es: - Es dinero de impuestos. - Era necesario.

translation.en: Come on.
If not for us, all of this would be gone.
translation.es: De no ser por nosotros, esto no existiría.

translation.en: Even you have to admit it, we deserve a little fun.
-Fun? -Yeah.
Right.
All I can think about are these people having fun without a care in the world.
translation.es: Solo puedo pensar en estas personas divirtiéndose sin preocupaciones.

translation.en: -If they knew what we knew. -They'd be shitting themselves.
translation.es: - Si tan solo supieran la verdad. - Morirían de miedo.

translation.en: That's why they can never know.
It's fucked up when you think about it.
translation.es: Es muy retorcido si lo piensas.

translation.en: Gotta be a little fucked up to do this, right?
translation.es: Hay que ser retorcido para este trabajo.

translation.en: Yeah. That's what we signed up for.
Somebody's got to answer the call.
translation.es: Alguien tiene que hacer el trabajo.

translation.en: Never letting our guard down. Always on duty.
translation.es: Jamás bajar la guardia. Siempre en servicio.

translation.en: Not tonight.
Not tonight.
-Are we… -Shut up.
-Fuck. -I'll do it.
Oh, shit. Looks like you're going commando in more ways than one.
translation.es: Mierda. No estás usando ropa interior.

translation.en: -I like to let it breathe. -Oh, fuck.
Here.
Oh, shit. These are regular size. I'm used to Magnum XL's.
translation.es: Mierda. Estos son regulares. Suelo usar los extragrandes.

translation.en: I'm drunk. Not blind. Put it on.
-[grunts] -Okay.
Let's not forget who's in command.
translation.es: No olvides quién está al mando.

translation.en: -You know I don't take orders well. -Maybe I should be more forceful.
translation.es: - No me gusta seguir órdenes. - Tendré que ser más severa.

translation.en: This is amazing. You're so fucking amazing. I love you.
translation.es: Esto es increíble. Eres increíble. Te amo.

translation.en: I loved you since the first moment I saw you.
translation.es: Te amo desde el primer momento en que te vi.

translation.en: [awkwardly] Okay…
-What's wrong? -Nothing. Just keep going.
-Do you not feel… -Just keep going.
-I can't. -Me neither.
-Look, sorry if I… -Don't be sorry.
I thought that since the mission was over, we'd never see each other again.
translation.es: Pensé que no nos volveríamos a ver, ya que la misión terminó.

translation.en: Now we definitely won't.
Hey, cowboy. I think I've got a cure for your Varsity Blues.
translation.es: Hola, vaquero. Creo que tengo la cura para tu tristeza.

translation.en: -What the fuck? -Lerner!
-Tech Chick. -What are you doing?
The two of you? What the hell?
-Just take it easy. -Take it easy?
You've been saying he's nothing but a meat bag with small dick energy.
translation.es: Siempre dices que se comporta como si tuviera un pene pequeño.

translation.en: You said what?
Oh, my God. I'm such an idiot.
-[Ava] Oh! -Jesus Christ.
Oh, fuck. This was a big mistake.
You can say that again.
Says the guy who dropped the L word.
translation.es: Tú fuiste el que habló de amor.

translation.en: I meant I love that ass. I'm an ass man. Everyone knows that.
translation.es: Dije que amaba tu trasero. Amo los traseros. Todos lo saben.

translation.en: And it's the ecstasy talking.
I said "I love you" to so many people tonight.
translation.es: Le dije "te amo" a mucha gente hoy.

translation.en: I said it to the fucking camel.
-I'm out of here. -Lerner, wait.
You know, I actually looked up to you, but you're full of shit.
translation.es: En verdad te admiraba, pero eres una farsa.

translation.en: That's why you work undercover, because you're so good at lying.
translation.es: Por eso trabajas encubierta, porque eres una gran mentirosa.

translation.en: Bitch.
Look at Tech Chick letting it all hang out. A for effort.
translation.es: Bien por Cerebrito por decir lo que piensa. Sobresaliente.

translation.en: -[cell phone chimes] -Oh, where's my phone?
[exhaling] What is this?
[distorted male voice] To those who have Ivan Koslov,
translation.es: A quienes tienen a Ivan Koslov,

translation.en: as you have probably now realized, the bomb you deactivated was a fake.
translation.es: como se habrán dado cuenta, la bomba que desactivaron era falsa.

translation.en: We still have the five kiloton nuclear device,
translation.es: Aún tenemos el dispositivo nuclear de cinco kilotones

translation.en: and we will detonate it unless you release Mr. Koslov.
translation.es: y lo detonaremos si no liberan al Sr. Koslov.

translation.en: Any attempt to evacuate the city will result in immediate detonation.
translation.es: Si intentan evacuar la ciudad, la detonación será inmediata.

translation.en: You have until 9:00 a.m.
If you do not comply, the city will be obliterated.
translation.es: Si no obedecen, la ciudad será arrasada.

translation.en: -What's that? Some other booty call? -Fuck!
Hey, hey. You seen McKnight?
He's in the master bedroom with his dick hanging out. He's all yours.
translation.es: Está en su habitación con el pene al aire. Todo tuyo.

translation.en: What did he tell you?
The bomb was fake? We got the nuke, right?
translation.es: ¿Cómo que era una bomba falsa? ¿No la tenemos?

translation.en: I don't know.
If it's a hoax, Langdon wouldn't passed it on.
translation.es: Es importante, o no me habrían llamado.

translation.en: -Shit. This is bad. -Yeah.
You had to go and throw this fucking party.
translation.es: Tenías que hacer una maldita fiesta.

translation.en: We thought the mission was over.
-God. -Jesus.
-Someone can't handle their liquor. -Go fuck yourself.
translation.es: - No toleras bien el alcohol. - Púdrete.

translation.en: We have a call with Langdon in five minutes.
translation.es: Debemos hablar con Langdon en cinco minutos.

translation.en: We need to clear this place out.
It's a goddamn shame we got to break this up.
translation.es: Es una pena que tengamos que detener esto.

translation.en: -Excuse me. -Hey, where you going, baby girl?
Excuse me, everyone. There's been an emergency, so we all have to…
translation.es: Disculpen. Hay una emergencia, así que tendremos que…

translation.en: Party to the break of dawn!
Party's over! Get the fuck out!
-You got to go. -[Chad] All right, let's go.
[Ava] Go! You gotta go. Yeah, right now. Go.
Hey, you gotta go!
-[woman] Sarah, what are you doing? -What?
You're getting married. Billy's gonna be pissed. Let's go!
But I wanna stay!
I'm good. Thank you. Get out of here.
Let's go. Keep moving. Keep moving.
I'm just as sad as you.
translation.es: Me apena tanto como a ti.

translation.en: -All right. Thank you. -Got you.
You had so much fun.
What the fuck, Winters? Pussy block much?
SOCOM received a bomb threat.
translation.es: La SOCOM recibió una amenaza de bomba.

translation.en: If we don't release Ivan Koslov, Las Vegas will be destroyed
translation.es: Si no liberamos a Koslov, volarán Las Vegas

translation.en: by a five kilo-bomb device.
-Kilo-bomb? That sounds bad. -That's not what I meant.
translation.es: - ¿Una kilobomba? Eso es malo. - No es lo que quise decir.

translation.en: "Kilo" means 1,000. So they're saying 5,000 bombs?
-I call bullshit. -Koslov's people have a nuke.
translation.es: - Es mentira. - Los rusos tienen la bomba.

translation.en: -This is why I don't drink. -Oh! Good for you, Paul.
translation.es: - Por esto es que no bebo. - Qué bien por ti, Paul.

translation.en: We should all be so fucking boring. Fuck.
translation.es: Deberíamos ser igual de aburridos. Carajo.

translation.en: Shit. Langdon wants to Zoom.
translation.es: Mierda. Langdon quiere hacer una videollamada.

translation.en: Fuck. Look at this place.
-The bedroom. -Come on.
Smells like somebody got their fuck on in here.
translation.es: Huele a que alguien cogió aquí.

translation.en: -Nobody got their fuck on in here. -Somebody fornicated in here.
translation.es: - Nadie cogió aquí. - Alguien fornicó aquí.

translation.en: She couldn't have been that good. Dude didn't finish.
translation.es: Ella no estuvo muy bien, porque él no acabó.

translation.en: Probably some limp-dick with erectile dysfunction.
translation.es: Seguro él tenía una disfunción eréctil.

translation.en: Oh, shit.
Much better.
Good. You're all there.
We've been analyzing the message. It was sent from within Clark County.
translation.es: Analizamos el mensaje. Fue enviado desde el condado de Clark.

translation.en: No doubt from a Koslov associate.
translation.es: Sin dudas es un socio de Koslov.

translation.en: What's the threat crebidility? Credibility.
The lab report on the bomb you retrieved showed only traces of isotopic uranium.
translation.es: El laboratorio analizó la bomba y halló una cantidad mínima de uranio.

translation.en: Just enough to be detected, but not enough for an explosion.
translation.es: Suficiente para ser detectada, pero no para una explosión.

translation.en: Highly sophisticated copy.
That means someone working for Koslov still has the mother lode.
translation.es: Eso quiere decir que algún socio de Koslov tiene la verdadera.

translation.en: The lab has been trying to get in touch with your EOD. Is he there with you?
translation.es: El laboratorio intentó contactar al experto en bombas. ¿Está con ustedes?

translation.en: -Hagerty's here. -Good.
We're gonna need his magic if this turns out to be as bad as we…
translation.es: Necesitaremos su habilidad si esto es tan malo como…

translation.en: Wait. What is that?
Sorry, someone moved a camel. Statue.
translation.es: Lo siento, alguien movió una estatua de camello.

translation.en: Look, Winters, I know tonight was supposed to be a celebration.
translation.es: Mire, Winters, entiendo que hoy debían celebrar.

translation.en: But as we all know, in our line of work, we're always on call.
translation.es: Pero en nuestro trabajo siempre estamos en servicio.

translation.en: I assume your team celebrated responsibly, and nobody took things too far.
translation.es: Asumo que su equipo celebró de forma responsable y moderada.

translation.en: No, sir, we all celerated… Celebrated responsibly.
I just want to know, is your team ready to get back into this?
translation.es: Quiero saber, ¿su equipo está listo para volver a trabajar?

translation.en: -[softly] Fuck. No. -[Angela] Mmm.
Sir…
Ready as a dog in heat, sir.
That's what I like to hear. Ball's in your court.
translation.es: Eso es lo que quería oír. Ahora depende de ustedes.

translation.en: You have a little over seven hours. Find that nuke.
translation.es: Tienen unas siete horas. Encuentren la bomba.

translation.en: "Ready as a dog in heat?" Our blood alcohol's through the roof.
translation.es: ¿"Más listos que nunca"? Nuestro alcohol en sangre es altísimo.

translation.en: You shitheads took drugs. We gotta stand down.
We do that, who they gonna replace us with? The fucking FBI?
translation.es: Y si lo hacemos, ¿quién nos reemplazará? ¿El FBI?

translation.en: Fucking FBI sucks.
If they could handle this shit, they'd be handling it.
translation.es: Si pudieran hacerlo, lo habrían hecho.

translation.en: -I hate to admit. She has a point. -[Chad] Even Paul agrees.
translation.es: - Odio admitir que tiene razón. - Hasta Paul está de acuerdo.

translation.en: Now I don't care how fucked up we are, Winters.
translation.es: No me importa cuán ebrios estemos, Winters.

translation.en: We're still the best in the game.
Now, let's fucking finish this.
-Okay. We're back on. -[Angela] Let's do this shit.
What do we know?
Koslov sold a fake bomb. But why?
translation.es: ¿Por qué Koslov vendió una bomba falsa?

translation.en: Because he's a lying commie son of a bitch.
For the last time, Koslov is not a communist.
translation.es: Por última vez, Koslov no es comunista.

translation.en: He only cares about money, he… Wait.
translation.es: Solo le interesa el dinero, él… Esperen.

translation.en: [in Russian] Our guests have arrived and are ready to eat.
translation.es: Nuestros invitados están listos para comer.

translation.en: They are waiting for you.
I love you.
[in Russian] Let them wait, it's only appetizers.
translation.es: Que esperen. Solo son los aperitivos.

translation.en: I'll be on time for the main course.
The fake was the appetizer. Real nuke, the main course.
translation.es: La verdadera bomba es el plato principal.

translation.en: -What do you mean? -Think about it.
Koslov could trick the crypto guys into buying a fake
translation.es: Koslov sabía que podría vender la falsa

translation.en: but only if he had a higher offer.
A second buyer?
It's like selling a bag of oregano to a teenager
translation.es: Es como venderle orégano a un adolescente

translation.en: while saving the real deal for someone more savvy.
translation.es: para vender lo real a alguien experimentado.

translation.en: -Oh! -Saw an opportunity to get paid twice.
Okay, where's Lerner? She needs to pull up the operation files.
translation.es: Bien, ¿dónde está Lerner? Debe buscar los archivos de la misión.

translation.en: -She took off about 20 minutes ago. -Took off where?
Where's my special cheeseburger?
I already told you. We don't serve food here.
translation.es: Ya te dije que no servimos comida.

translation.en: Then what the fuck you call this?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿cómo mierda le llamas a esto?

translation.en: I want my special cheeseburger! Medium rare, plus extra mayo.
translation.es: ¡Quiero mi hamburguesa especial! Término medio y con mucha mayonesa.

translation.en: I'm not supposed to say this, but you've had a little too much to drink.
translation.es: No debería decirlo, pero bebiste demasiado.

translation.en: You've had a little too much to drink.
Just give her the goddamn burger. Okay? Customer's always right.
translation.es: Solo dale la maldita hamburguesa, ¿sí? El cliente tiene la razón.

translation.en: -Thanks. -Yeah.
At least one person in this whole city has my back.
translation.es: Al menos una persona en esta ciudad me apoya.

translation.en: Anytime, girl.
Let me guess, boy trouble?
My boss fucked my crush.
translation.es: Mi jefa se cogió a mi crush.

translation.en: Damn.
I even put on the whipped cream and everything.
translation.es: Incluso me había puesto crema batida y todo.

translation.en: You think that's bad?
My man was supposed to take me to go see J.Lo at Resorts World. Ghosted me.
translation.es: Mi novio debía llevarme a ver a Jennifer Lopez y jamás apareció.

translation.en: The real question is what are we going to do about it?
translation.es: La pregunta es: ¿qué haremos al respecto?

translation.en: What do you mean?
[scoffs] I mean we are two, hot single women in Vegas.
translation.es: Digo que somos dos hermosas solteras en Las Vegas.

translation.en: One of us smells like a goddamn ice cream sundae. [chuckles]
People ought to be lined up. It's time we do things our way.
translation.es: Deberían hacer fila. Hay que hacer las cosas a nuestra manera.

translation.en: Hey, you want to take a ride with me?
Fuck yeah. Ride or die.
Let's do it! You got little titties too. You can shake 'em.
-You've reached Maya Lerner… -Damn it.
translation.es: - Se contactó con Maya Lerner… - Demonios.

translation.en: Someone give me a laptop. I'll access the files myself.
translation.es: Denme una computadora. Lo haré yo misma.

translation.en: -Your lab partner left her shit. -[Ava] Ah!
-About what happened earlier… -Nothing happened.
translation.es: - Sobre lo que pasó… - No pasó nada.

translation.en: [Ava] Once I access this database,
translation.es: Accederé a la base de datos,

translation.en: we'll be able to look at everything and I'll be able to pare down Koslov…
translation.es: veremos todo y buscaremos al socio de Koslov…

translation.en: -Oh shit! -Oh! Fucking gross, Winters.
-The fuck did you eat? -I don't think I ate.
There's chunks of food in there. Is that quesadilla?
translation.es: Hay restos de comida. ¿Eso es quesadilla?

translation.en: There was quesadillas? No one told me there was quesadillas.
translation.es: ¿Había quesadillas? Nadie me dijo que había quesadillas.

translation.en: There were no quesadillas.
Uh… Anybody have a mint?
I could go for some quesadillas.
Oh, shit, that may have been drugs.
translation.es: Puede que eso haya sido droga.

translation.en: Fuck the computer.
You want to get that bomb back?
Drag Koslov out of his cell and beat it out of him.
translation.es: Hay que golpear a Koslov para que hable.

translation.en: Koslov is old-school. His father was KGB. He's not gonna give it up easy.
translation.es: Koslov es muy tradicional. Su padre era de la KGB. No cederá.

translation.en: He was prepared for this, knew what would happen if we captured him,
translation.es: Está preparado para esto, sabía lo que pasaría si era capturado,

translation.en: he knows what happens next.
So we're all going to need to sober up real fucking quick.
translation.es: Así que tenemos que despejarnos rápido.

translation.en: If the nuke is still out there,
translation.es: Si la bomba sigue ahí afuera

translation.en: and one of Koslov's men has it, we're back to square one.
translation.es: y uno de sus hombres la tiene, empezamos desde cero.

translation.en: [man in Russian] The weapon is ready.
The countdown has begun.
Have you made contact?
I have the NSA op.
What's taking so long? Get in here, girl! [giggles]
She doesn't suspect a thing.
[in Russian] Excellent.
Ooh! I hope there's champs in there, because we getting fucked…
translation.es: Espero que haya champán, porque vamos a ponernos…

translation.en: -Up! -Up!
I already knew. Whoo!
All right, we all need to clear our minds,
forget anything that happened tonight, and get back on our A-game. ASAP.
translation.es: olvidar todo lo que pasó hoy y volver al trabajo. Es urgente.

translation.en: Everyone.
-[Hagerty] Ladies and gentlemen. -Oh, God.
-Shit! -Fuck, Hagerty.
Nope.
-Hagerty has left the building. -Uh, no.
-[all exclaim] -[Trunk] Shit!
-Hagerty? -Oh, my God.
-Let's go! We got commies to interrogate! -Let's go! Come on.
-[Chad] Oh, shit! -[Trunk] Fuck.
[Chad] Go!
Everyone strap in!
-Are you sure you're okay to fly? -Yep, I've got nothing in my system.
translation.es: - ¿Seguro que puedes volar? - Sí, no consumí nada.

translation.en: Other than an entire bowl of chips and guac.
translation.es: Más que un bol de papas y guacamole.

translation.en: Thank God one of us is sober.
translation.es: Gracias a Dios alguien está sobrio.
